benchmark_details.name: ImageNet3D
benchmark_details.overview: ImageNet3D is a large dataset for general-purpose object-level 3D understanding that augments 200 categories from the ImageNet dataset with 2D bounding box, 3D pose, 3D location annotations, and image captions interleaved with 3D information.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: Facilitate the evaluation and research of general-purpose object-level 3D understanding models.

data.annotation: Annotated by a team of 30 trained annotators

methodology.calculation: Pose accuracy is measured by the percentage of samples with pose errors smaller than a pre-defined threshold.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better performance in 3D awareness and classification.
methodology.baseline_results: Results demonstrate the potential of models trained on ImageNet3D compared to existing datasets.
methodology.validation: Cross-validation performed on multiple model metrics.
